name: docusaurus
description: Docusaurus is a static site generator optimized for documentation websites. It uses Markdown and React to build versioned docs, blogs, and landing pages, and ships with localization, search integrations, and theming for developer documentation portals.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write docs in Markdown with MDX support for embedding React components and interactive elements

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Index content automatically with Algolia DocSearch integration for fast, relevant search results

features.title: Blog Integration
features.description: Publish release notes, tutorials, and updates using the built-in blog with RSS feed generation

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Modify appearance with CSS variables or create completely custom themes using React components

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Extend functionality with community plugins for analytics, sitemap generation, and content processing

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Generate optimized static sites with code splitting, prefetching, and progressive web app capabilities
